Class MemberSale

java.lang.Object
MemberSale
public class MemberSale
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a member's sales information including small, large, and combo sales, as well as total sales, club fundraising total, and tax allocation. This class encapsulates sales data for a member including their name, quantities of small, large, and combo sales, total sales amount, club fundraising total, and tax allocation based on the sales.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private float club
    Holds club sale for each member.
    private int combos
    Holds combo sale for each member.
    private int larges
    Holds large sale for each member.
    private float marks
    Holds tax for marks of each member.
    private java.lang.String name
    Holds name for each member.
    private int smalls
    Holds small sale for each member.
    private float total
    Holds total sale for each member.
